name: shadow-file-restricted
notes: Analysis is fundamentally constrained by the security restrictions of the execution environment. Actual file content cannot be inspected. For a complete analysis, restrictions must be relaxed or the file must be examined in a different environment.

name: afp[SECRET_VALUE]-restricted
notes: Additional methods are required to bypass security restrictions or obtain a file copy for comprehensive analysis. This file may contain sensitive user [SECRET_VALUE]entication information.

name: avahi-config-clean
description: The configuration file primarily includes standard configuration options for the Avahi daemon. All potentially sensitive configuration items (such as host-name, domain-name, publish-dns-servers, etc.) are either commented out or set to default values. No hardcoded credentials or sensitive information were found.
notes: Although no sensitive information was found, it is recommended to check other configuration files to comprehensively assess system security.
